edu.stanford.folding.msmexplorer.io
Class MSMIOLib

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.folding.msmexplorer.io.MSMIOLib

public class MSMIOLib
extends java.lang.Object

MSMExplorer I/O basic functions, including open and save operations. All methods should be static.

Open a newline delimited file and attempt to add the contents of that file to the graph g into a new column of name.

Parameters:

name - name to give the new column
Returns:
string pathname for the folder where the file was opened

getMSMFile

public static prefuse.data.Graph getMSMFile(java.awt.Component c)
Opens a load dialog to get a new MSM. Starts path at home directory.

Parameters:
c - parent component (optional)
Returns:
the opened graph, or null if no new graph successfully opened

getMSMFile

public static prefuse.data.Graph getMSMFile(java.awt.Component c,
                                            java.lang.String path)
Opens a load dialog to get a new MSM. Starts the dialog at location specified by path. or the home directory if path doesn't resolve to a directory.

Parameters:
c - parent component (optional)
path - where to start load dialog
Returns:
the opened graph, or null if no new graph successfully opened
